actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the sale by former President Richard M. Nixon of the estate known as San Clemente.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Director of the Secret Service and the Administrator of General Services shall obtain reimbursement for the amount by which federally-funded improvements increased the value of the California estate known as San Clemente at the time of its sale by former President Richard M. Nixon.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the sale by former President Richard M. Nixon of the estate known as San Clemente.
